document.full_text: the chicago bulls advanced to the eastern conference finals for the first time since 1998 with a series-clinching 93-73 win over the atlanta hawks on thursday.
document.title: nba's bulls beat hawks to reach eastern final
lines_and_colors: the chicago bulls advanced to the eastern conference finals for the first time since 1998 with a series-clinching 93-73 win over the atlanta hawks on thursday.
